metadata.title: CVE-2018-19198 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriQuery.c allows anout-of-bounds write via a uriComposeQuery* or uriComposeQueryEx* functionbecause the '&' character is mishandled in certain contexts.

criterions.comment: uriparser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
